segments.text: The boy on the stool is about to fall, and he doesn’t even know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s stretching so far into that cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got his hand in the cookie jar, but he’s going to pay for it if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this—someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
